articles.description: Juventus midfielder Paul Pogba is banned from football for four years for a doping offence.
articles.title: Juventus' Pogba banned for four years for doping

articles.description: La Liga president Javier Tebas says he hopes Manchester United's on-loan striker Mason Greenwood stays in Spain after his loan at Getafe ends.
articles.title: La Liga chief wants Greenwood to stay in Spain

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton leads a Mercedes one-two in Friday practice at the season-opening Bahrain Grand Prix.
articles.title: Lewis Hamilton tops Bahrain Grand Prix second practice

articles.description: Al-Nassr forward Cristiano Ronaldo is banned for one match for "provoking fans" following the Saudi Pro League win over Al-Shabab.
articles.title: Ronaldo banned for gesture after 'Messi' chants

articles.description: Australia all-rounder Cameron Green scores a century as he produces his side's main resistance on the opening day of the first Test in New Zealand.
articles.title: Australia's Green scores century to repel Kiwis

articles.description: Mercedes team boss Toto Wolff calls for "more transparency" from Red Bull after the company rejected a complaint against Christian Horner.
articles.title: Christian Horner allegations: Mercedes' Toto Wolff calls for 'more transparency' from Red Bull

articles.description: Britain's Katie Boulter comes from a set down to beat Brazil's Beatriz Haddad Maia in the San Diego Open second round.
articles.title: San Diego Open: Katie Boulter beats Beatriz Haddad Maia to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: Fulham "should apologise" for posting a video on TikTok that appears to mock Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes, says Erik ten Hag.
articles.title: 'Fulham should apologise for Fernandes TikTok'

articles.description: LeBron James scores 34 points to help the Los Angeles Lakers overcome a 21-point deficit to beat the Los Angeles Clippers 116-112.
articles.title: NBA: LeBron James stars in dramatic LA Lakers comeback win against LA Clippers

articles.description: Bordeaux striker Alberth Elis is "waking up" from an induced coma and "seems to be gradually recovering" from a serious head injury, says his family.
articles.title: Bordeaux striker Elis 'waking up' from coma
